data.text: @JamesDeVille Thanks for the motion and the yes vote tonight!

@JamesDeVille Masking is causing anxiety in children who are not in danger of sickness and even if they do get sick, they recover quickly. Optional is the only right thing to do. Schools are the only reminder of this damn virus. The rest of the world has moved on. What message are we sending.

@JamesDeVille As a constituent and a public health expert, I strongly urge you not to go mask optional. Do you want to stay in yellow? Or go to red? I still think with #BA2 coming up behind us green is far away.
@JamesDeVille I appreciate your efforts but I have ZER0 faith in the rest of the JCPS board. Most do the opposite of what parents, kids and teachers want out of spite. They have made that clear.
@JamesDeVille Unmask my kid, seriously nobody is requiring them except @JCPSSuper @JCPSKY
@JamesDeVille We need to reduce from 10 to 5 days first!!
